pkgmetadata.longdescription: Examples using 'Rcpp' to Interface R and C++ // Examples for Seamless R and C++ integration The 'Rcpp' package contains a C++ library that facilitates the integration of R and C++ in various ways. This package provides some usage examples. Note that the documentation in this package currently does not cover all the features in the package. The site https://gallery.rcpp.org regroups a large number of examples for 'Rcpp'.
